sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MSTR_05_0100 ( DPOB_CD , DILNLAZ_OPT_YR , WKDY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dilnlazOptYr# , #wkdyDutyRcgtnTm# , #satDutyRcgtnTm# , #satDutyRcgtnMultpe# , #pubcHodyDutyRcgtnTm# , #pubcHodyDutyRcgtnMultpe# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MSTR_05_0100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , DILNLAZ_OPT_YR=#dilnlazOptYr# , WKDY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM=#wkdyDutyRcgtnTm# , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_TM=#satDutyRcgtnTm# , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE=#satDutyRcgtnMultpe# , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM=#pubcHodyDutyRcgtnTm# , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE=#pubcHodyDutyRcgtnMultpe# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DILNLAZ_OPT_YR=#dilnlazOptYr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MSTR_05_0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DILNLAZ_OPT_YR=#dilnlazOptYr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DILNLAZ_OPT_YR , WKDY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM MSTR_05_0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DILNLAZ_OPT_YR=#dilnlazOptYr#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DILNLAZ_OPT_YR , WKDY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , SAT_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_TM , PUBC_HODY_DUTY_RCGTN_MULTPE , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM MSTR_05_0100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DILNLAZ_OPT_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , DILNLAZ_OPT_YR DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MSTR_05_0100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DILNLAZ_OPT_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
